name: Ball Journey (Mdeveloper)
description:
After a big pandemic, the Ball wanted to go in a small journey with his friends.

  They decided that the best location will be the Space Playground and the Desert Playground.

His friends decided to go to the boat to eat something when he was taking some photos,  meanwhile  the highway that was supposed to go at  the port was destroyed by a big ship and was closed.

He knew that the next day will be the last day when the boat is in port and he had a plan, to avoid the closed highway props and jump to the boat, but he didn't know that another big ship  had the same traiectoria as his boat.

W/A/S/D/Left/Right/Up/Down to lock the mouse pointer and Leftclick to unlock

W/S- UP/DOWN

A/D-LEFT/RIGHT

Mouse move the camera and you have 3 positions of view. (vertical)

Level1- Avoid the walls and dont jump down.

Level2-Avoid the Pyramid walls and don't fall down.

Level3-Avoid the Red Walls and the edge of the road.(you need to jump at the end of the road, max speed after you came back to the ground)
